page.title: 03Farming Gaggs Farm
page.content: Mr. Gagg employs twelve male farm workers and thirty five ladies who work in the packing department.His farm which covers eight hundred acres grows carrots,parsnips,turnips,peas and potatoes.Throughout the whole business eighty five people are employed .New machinery installed this year packs over one thousand five hundread tons of carrots annually.With the growth in fresh food production it is expected that the business will expand by fifty per cent in the next two or three years.Much of the increased production will go to export markets.The main problems in growing vegetables on a commercial basis in Swinderby are the changeable weather and the constant attack by insects.
